title: Talking about Trouble - author develops ideas

content.prompt: The author uses which of the following to develop his ideas in the passage?

choices.label: An extended metaphor for describing the nature of suffering
A series of assertions followed by counterexamples
Logical argument in support of several different theses
A series of generalizations supported by reasoning and hypothetical instances

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
